item.title: Huion 8\" x 5\" Art Design Slim Large Area Graphic USB Drawing TabletPen (Black)
item.description: Huion 8" x 5" Art Design Slim Large Area Graphic USB Drawing Tablet Pen (Black) This Huion 580 Area Art Graphics Drawing Tablet is specially designed for those artists architects designers. It can be used to record everything from your signature to your handwriting to original drawings directly to your computer. The tablet pen functions as the cursor and the board as the screen when you move the pen to the corner of the board the cursor on your screen moves to the corner of said screen.
